akn:section.akn:heading: Action by President after determination of import injury

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Implementation of action recommended by Commission

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Implementation of action recommended by Commission If the President reports under subsection (b)(1) or (2) that— the action recommended by the Commission shall take effect (as provided in subsection (d)(2)) upon the enactment of a joint resolution described in section 2192(a)(1)(A) of this title within the 90-day period beginning on the date on which the document referred to in subsection (b)(1) or (2) is transmitted to the Congress.
